mfa_enrollment_title: Secure your account with two-factor authentication!
mfa_enrollment_info1: The security provided by a simple password is not always sufficient. We strongly recommend that you enable 2-step verification of your account.
mfa_enrollment_info2: By enabling it, you increase your security level and protect your data. In addition to an account password, a validation code sent via SMS to your phone or a security key is required to enable the connection.
